Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.app.api.perception

Interface PerceptionModule<ConfigT extends PerceptionModuleConfiguration>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPerceptionModule, NopPerceptionModule, SimplePerceptionModule, SumoPerceptionModule
public interface PerceptionModule<ConfigT extends PerceptionModuleConfiguration>

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    enable(ConfigT configuration)
    Enables and configures this perception module.
    ConfigT
    getConfiguration()
    Returns The configuration of the PerceptionModule.
    List<SpatialObject<?>>
    getPerceivedObjects()
    Call to get all perceived traffic objects within perception range.
    List<TrafficLightObject>
    getPerceivedTrafficLights()
    Call to get all traffic lights within perception range.
    List<VehicleObject>
    getPerceivedVehicles()
    Returns a list of all VehicleObjects inside the perception range of this vehicle.
    Collection<Edge<Vector3d>>
    getSurroundingWalls()
    Call to get surrounding building walls.
    boolean
    isEnabled()
    Returns true if PerceptionModule is enabled, otherwise false.

  • Method Details

    • enable

      void enable(ConfigT configuration)
      Enables and configures this perception module.
      Parameters:
      configuration - the configuration object

    • getConfiguration

      ConfigT getConfiguration()
      Returns The configuration of the PerceptionModule.

    • isEnabled

      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns true if PerceptionModule is enabled, otherwise false.

    • getPerceivedVehicles

      List<VehicleObject> getPerceivedVehicles()
      Returns a list of all VehicleObjects inside the perception range of this vehicle.

    • getPerceivedTrafficLights

      List<TrafficLightObject> getPerceivedTrafficLights()
      Call to get all traffic lights within perception range.
      Returns:
      a list of all TrafficLightObjects inside the perception range of this vehicle.

    • getPerceivedObjects

      List<SpatialObject<?>> getPerceivedObjects()
      Call to get all perceived traffic objects within perception range. Note: That these will all be the type of SpatialObject and you need to properly check types using instanceof.
      Returns:
      a list of all SpatialObjects inside the perception range

    • getSurroundingWalls

      Collection<Edge<Vector3d>> getSurroundingWalls()
      Call to get surrounding building walls.
      Returns:
      a list of all surrounding building walls in the for of Edges
